sentences.en: Armed soldiers guard the streets in this volatile atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 目前局势动荡不定，有武装士兵在街道上警戒。

sentences.en: Cracking involves the chemical breakdown of higher, less volatile hydrocarbons into smaller molecules.
sentences.cn: 裂化是使较重的低挥发性的碳氢化合物分裂成较小分子的化学分裂.

sentences.en: Edwards was a dangerously volatile character.
sentences.cn: 爱德华喜怒无常,十分危险.

sentences.en: First McNeil had to cool down the volatile Australian 20-year old.
sentences.cn: 首先麦克尼尔得让那个脾气暴躁的20岁澳大利亚小伙子冷静下来。

sentences.en: Her volatile spirits shot up from deepest depression to excited happiness.
sentences.cn: 她轻易多变的心情从沮丧的深渊飞升到快乐的云霄中去了.

sentences.en: His character was weak and volatile.
sentences.cn: 他这个人意志薄弱,喜怒无常.

sentences.en: Identify the volatile product and comment.
sentences.cn: 鉴定此挥发性产品并评述.

sentences.en: It is like the sense of chill that follows immersion of the hand in a volatile liquid.
sentences.cn: 这很像把手浸入挥发性液体后的那种凉飕飕的感觉.

sentences.en: the highly volatile stock and bond markets
sentences.cn: 相当不稳定的股票和债券市场

sentences.en: The international oil markets have been highly volatile since the early 1970s.
sentences.cn: 从20世纪70年代初开始，国际石油市场就一直很不稳定。

sentences.en: The monoterpenoids are dominant components in the " volatile oils " of plant species.
sentences.cn: 单萜类化合物是植物挥发油的主要成份.

sentences.en: The situation in that area was tense, dangerous and volatile.
sentences.cn: 该地区的局势紧张 、 危险,且有一触即发之势.

sentences.en: There have been riots before and the situation is volatile.
sentences.cn: 以前曾发生过暴乱，现在局势不太稳定。

sentences.en: With the markets being so volatile, investments are at great risk.
sentences.cn: 由于市场那么变化不定, 投资冒着很大的风险.

words.tran_cn: [化学]挥发性的；不稳定的；爆炸性的；反覆无常的

phrases.tran_cn: [地质]挥发分；[地质]挥发性组份
挥发物含量；挥发组分含量
挥发性减蚀剂；挥发性防腐纸；挥发性防锈剂

trans.tran_cn: 易变的，不稳定的，（液体或油）易挥发的，爆炸性的，快活的，轻快的
trans.tran_en: a volatile situation is likely to change suddenly and without warning
